lender.name: Bruce and Christina
lender.loan_because: Especially in the western world we need to re-distribute wealth and help others.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: Don't you feel better when you do the right thing?

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very cool idea. I love the way people can be helped to help themselves.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: my husband and I were very involved in the churches in South America and saw first hand how micro enterprise changed the lives of the poor

lender.name: Stacey & Sherry
lender.loan_because: I think it's a phenomenal idea!!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a landscape construction business.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: My family and I believe that God has blessed us and that we have a responsibility to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the principal of a small, private inner city school.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.occupational_info: I spend evenings filling the shelves in supermarkets with groceries and cleaning products! It's a lot of hard work and lifting heavy things.

lender.name: Sholeh
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in another woman's life in the developing world. When I was young my family and I lost everything and left our country to start from scratch. That experience taught me how to build from the ground up and I started my own business and learned how to appreciate everthng so much more.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hair stylist who works with my clients one on one. I take appointments and work free lance. I literally have my own business, I work alone and I really love what I do.

lender.name: Lizbet
lender.loan_because: i want to help people get a new direction in life. i want to help whoever i can pick themselves and make an impact on their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a student but i teach violin.

lender.name: Terry Newcomb
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have been born and raised in the USA. Good Fortune should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I advertise our products (windows and doors) on radio, TV and the Internet.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of the solution for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I sell glass blown ornaments to people who celebrate Christmas

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I want to support women in impoverished countries where civil freedom is often tenuous, at best. Poverty worsens injustices against women and if this makes a difference, then it's worth it.

lender.name: St. Paul
lender.loan_because: God loves all of us,. and God wants us to love and help each other. We feel grateful for what we have, and we want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: We helped make a quilt to raffle to raise money for our Kiva Fund. We're learning how little kids can help make a difference and help someone across the world!

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: We have one life to live. So do they. Let's do it.

lender.name: David Johnson
lender.loan_because: I don't think I could ever think of a better way to use my money. This is extremely rewarding.

lender.name: Seema and Rajiv
lender.loan_because: Help others lead better life.

lender.name: Dovid
lender.loan_because: people have loaned to me. I like being able to know about people in other countries and their businesses and dreams. I wish everyone great success and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover money lost through bank card fraud. I also go to school to become a baker.

lender.name: Shadi
lender.loan_because: i like to share things...

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I live with a french family, taking care of their children and cooking. I also take french classes. I am working towards becoming trilingual.

lender.name: Anton Stoutjesdijk
lender.loan_because: Its important to support entrepreneurs and encourage growth in regions that dearly need it. If a balance amount of education is supplemented by financial initiatives, these projects and the communities effected by them, can be nothing short of positive.
lender.occupational_info:
Director of a translation/SEO agency, we perform professional translation and develop internet marketing campaigns and SEO agency support in 20 languages. We tend to supply our services to other agencies that are in need of reliable multilingual translation, copywriting or international SEO skills.
If you're looking for high quality translation or content for your website, a clients website, brochures, marketing materials - we provide a 100% satisfaction and fast delivery.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: There but for the grace of God, go I

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to improve their situation, and loans to individuals are much more empowering and effective than donations.

lender.name: Brooks
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in Oklahoma, learning to be a computer programmer.

lender.name: MCS105
lender.loan_because: lending is learning!
lender.occupational_info: Empowering students to make a positive impact on the global community.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because:
I hope the little I can do may make a change in the life of many.
Everyone deserves an opportunity to dream and think of how they can become self-sufficient through hard work and the help of others.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: B D
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering people to improve their own livelihoods through education and hard work is far more sustainable than just giving free aid.
lender.occupational_info: I am a biologist, photographer, writer and mountaineer who loves nature and being outdoors. I also love soccer (futbal) and played all my life.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and will help to enable others to improve their living.

lender.name: Becky & Emily

lender.occupational_info: I am a nursing student, mom, and wife. My daughter is a high school student. We enjoy choosing the people we want to help together.

lender.name: Claire

lender.occupational_info: I work for a Property & Facilites Management Company.

lender.occupational_info: I write the words and dream up the ideas that move people to desire, trust, and recommend products and services.

lender.occupational_info: I work as a high school librarian and I have started a small business as a jewelry metalsmith.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank, helping to keep the computers running smoothly.

lender.name: Laura

lender.name: Lisa

lender.name: benjamin
lender.loan_because: it's fun.

lender.occupational_info: We are a student run organization at Bucknell University, working on campus to increase awareness about microfinance using publicity and educational events. We are trying to build an organizational approach that can be effectively used by other universities as well

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to help in whatever small way I can. Everyone on this planet deserves the chance to be self-supportive.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a group of lawyers, where I do just about anything -- answer phones, write letters, meet with clients, draft documents, attend court hearings, etc.

lender.name: R & J
lender.loan_because: i feel that anyone wanting to build a business needs some help sometimes.

lender.name: Rockstar_Wedding_Planner
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I plan weddings and teach others how to plan weddings.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.whereabouts: San Jose del Cabo Baja California Sur

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because:
I wish to contribute to something meaningful, that can have a positive impact in someone's life. Everyone should be able to believe in a brighter future. Knowing that I can make a difference, even on a small scale, is heartwarming!
I had my share of difficulties and financial challenges in my life but I do feel blessed for the wonderful country where I live and the life I have compared to people living in less privileged countries. Micro-credit is a positive tool to alleviate poverty.

lender.name: Steorling
lender.loan_because: it's the way I've found to pass blessings forward and remember the author of all goodness.
lender.occupational_info: I play with teenagers every day, until we all learn something. ;)

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: A lot of doors were opened for me when I first started. Time to pay it forward.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: The world can't be a better place until we help everyone who needs it. And the only lasting way to help is to give them an opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: In my day to day life, I write software that tests other software. My job is to find problems so that the end user has a better experience.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.occupational_info: ‚ÄúSeek peace and pursue it‚Äù - Psalm 34:14

lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by our families and communities with steady work and no loans, and we want to share and invest our prosperity with other communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help connect families to each other and community resources in Seattle.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student majoring in anthropology at a small liberal arts college in America. I spent two months volunteering and teaching twenty five kindergartners at an orphanage in Ghana during the summer of 2008 and fell in love with the people, environment, and community. I can't wait to return to Africa next summer and continue to make a difference and give back to the world.

lender.name: Brandi, Sean and Todd

lender.name: cindyee
lender.loan_because: If just one person believes in you. Deep enough, and strong enough, believes in you hard enough,and long enough before you knew it, someone else would think, if he can do it, I can do it. Making it.. ... More, and more. And when all those people believe in you, deep enough and strong enough believe in you, hard enough and long enough it stands to reason you, yourself will start to see what everybody sees in you. And maybe even you, can believe in you, too.
lender.occupational_info: The master of the art of living makes little distinction between his work and his play, his labor and his leisure, his mind and his body, his information and his recreation, his love and his religion. He hardly knows which is which. He simply pursues his vision of excellence at whatever he does, leaving others to decide whether he is working or playing. To him, he‚Äôs always doing both.

lender.name: Talmage
lender.loan_because: Years ago I had had the privilege to visit Cambodia. It is a beautiful land and the Khmer people have a great history; however, the country has been ravaged by war and living conditions are challenging. I am pleased to help the kind people who accomodated me while I explored the wondrous and mysterious temples of the ancient Khmer empire.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of mathematics. I teach the subject to university students who will become doctors. My area of speciality is logic and infinity. The photograph is of my family home and dog named Indiana in Toronto, Canada.

lender.name: Sanne
lender.loan_because: I cannot think of a single reason not to.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I myself am a small business owner and I wouldn't have been successful without help from many, many people. My business has brought so much to my life, I am proud to be able to help someone else bring that sort of success to their lives.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to be self sufficient, and we all need a helping hand sometimes.

lender.name: Ranie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people and I believe,you shall give and you will received.May the world be a better place for everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a mother trying to get rich to be able helping other people :)

lender.loan_because: its a great opportunity to directly help someone I've never met.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hospital as a neurology nurse. I care for patients that have had brain or spinal surgeries/injuries.

lender.name: Mary Kate
lender.loan_because: we can all thrive with a little help from our friends. When everyone enjoys plenty, we will have peace on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I write scripts for movies and I am a journalist

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to give back!

lender.name: Tamarah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance, and it's our duty to help each other out.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: because i believe that micro loans are one of the most effective ways to help others in this world.. And each of us have an obligation to make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I design and quilt the patterns on quilts (blan kets) for clients who bring me their pieced tops

lender.name: Sheridan
lender.loan_because: some people need a hand up and by providng that I express my gratitude for people that have helped me. Just a little investment can have a long and lasting result for a better future.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I worked for a State agency that protects the ground water by regulating under ground storage tanks that hold gasoline. Without regs the water and soil could become contaminated. It was sort of boring, but I felt as if I was helping the big picture.

lender.loan_because: we want to share our blessings ...

lender.name: Gerry

lender.name: molly

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to college students.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: "If there is a poor man among your brothers in any of the towns of the land that the Lord your God is giving you, do not be hardhearted or tightfisted toward your poor brother. Rather be openhanded and freely lend him whatever he needs." -Deuteronomy 15:7
lender.occupational_info: I work on the power lines that transport electricity across the country between power plants and cities.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I have had the good fortune to have the many opportunities afforded me by being born in the USA to a middle class family; I wish to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a therapist who does counseling with children and families and I also am the clinical director of several out-patient programs that provide services to children and adolescents.

lender.name: James W
lender.loan_because: the world is a small place.

lender.name: Matilda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze and evaluate personal data on individuals and design group dynamic workshops that help people to become aware of their personal character traits; both known and unknown, and then I provide them with a report outlining what their strongest and weakest traits are. Together the client and I set up a positive life direction for their professional activities.

lender.name: FBC Microfinance Group
lender.loan_because: In his first sermon, Jesus said: "The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor. He has sent me to proclaim freedom for the prisoners and recovery of sight for the blind, to release the oppressed, to proclaim the year of the Lord's favor." (Luke 4:18-19) This message leads us to have compassion for the poor, not just in terms of charity, but to help them lift themselves up. We strongly support Kiva's work in helping entrepreneurs in less-developed countries start, maintain and grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We are members of the First Baptist Church in the city of Washington DC. Our church's mission is to love God and love one another. All are welcome at our church.

lender.name: Sreenivas
lender.loan_because: to spread entrepreneurial energy around the world and help eradicate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: An engineer and builder engaged in various types of construction

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance. Also, I love seeing those little green lines on the map view!
lender.occupational_info: I try to make computers understand language.

lender.name: Stanley
lender.loan_because: Being from Africa, I know firsthand what impact a small loan can have on an individual. Like they say, you are known not by what you do, but by what impact you make on others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the people business, personal banker/advisor. I have a heart for people and intend on doing what I can to leave my mark on the world.

lender.name: Cinty & Aris
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: Priscilla

lender.occupational_info: I assist the pharmacists in a retail pharmacy by counting and pouring medications, input of prescriptions in the computer and customer service.

lender.name: Troy

lender.occupational_info: I own a commercial & industrial roofing and sheet-metal company. I also own a sheet-metal business pecializing in copper products

lender.name: Jorge

lender.name: John & Dixie
lender.loan_because: I know from years past that a "hand up" is not a "hand out". There were times in my past that I nneded that same help. Those days are behind me and I am in a position to help.
lender.occupational_info: I started a small business installing glass windows in cars, buildings and houses. The business grew to 6-7 employees, and after 20 years I sold out due to my health and retired.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: basic finance still holds water.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a Kiva Fellow serving at Soro Yiriwaso, Kiva's first and only field partner in Mali!

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: Matthew 5:42 'Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.'

lender.name: Yuya
lender.loan_because: I want you to be happy !! That is also my happyness !!

lender.name: Art

lender.occupational_info: I work as a pizza delivery driver.

lender.name: Erich
lender.occupational_info: I look for errors in computer programs. I write a list of errors, and the errors must be fixed before the program is sold.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve a sustainable living.
lender.occupational_info: I'm starting a non-profit to build schools in majority-world countries. I believe education is the key to ending poverty.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: It is at the core of my Jewish belief system to help the less fortunate.

lender.name: Anne & Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the image of Americans in the world.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: the Lord says we are to carry each other's burdens.

lender.name: Kevin and Andrine
lender.loan_because: Other people helped us to be successful. We want to show our gratefulness to them by now helping others. We may like bugs, but we love people more.
lender.occupational_info: We are Entomologists, that is scientists who study insects. We conduct research on pests of grains, and do educational outreach to introduce children to biological science.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help other people grow their businesses

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am glad to have found this way of helping another hard working person by letting them know that someone cares.
lender.occupational_info: I work several hours a week editing Kiva loans, and I also do housekeeping and yard work as suits a 70-year-old retiree.

lender.name: Jose I
lender.loan_because:
I share my money. They share their dreams.
Yo comparto mi dinero. Ellos comparten sus sue√±os.

lender.name: Adii
lender.loan_because: As a young entrepeneur I always struggled to finance my business ideas and thus know that every bit I can give will help another upcoming entrepeneur in their quest for financial security & freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business owner and primarily work online.

lender.name: Jacob & Roslyn
lender.loan_because: We are pleased to help people improve their quality of life and assist them to become more independent and to better support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We are elderly and retired now. Jacob used to teach for many years, Roslyn did office work and was a sales clerk as well as a homemaker.

lender.name: abduljelil
lender.occupational_info: very interesting

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: Because I am able to and others can use a hand up not hand outs
lender.occupational_info: Retired but I used to own a bakery/catering business

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who want to help themselves. Everyone should have the opportunity to prosper. I am not able to lend much because I am also struggling to make ends meet. I hope that the little I can do makes a difference in someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and a mother. I take care of my two children and I am going to school to become a teacher. In the evenings, I help foreign families learn English.

lender.name: Sahima
lender.loan_because: It just feels good to know that I can help others fufill thier goals and better thier lives at the same time.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I care and I think its amazing what a small amount of money (to me) can do for someone else. Also I am interested in business myself and its good to see people starting businesses in these countries.
lender.occupational_info: I type insurance information from papers onto a computer.

lender.name: chandika
lender.loan_because: somebody needs it.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student studying in USA

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I am a strong supporter of trade not aid as a powerful way to alleviate poverty and promote social justice.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs/small business owners and nongovernmental organizations on how to more effectively work together to solve local and global issues.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: Prison Officer And Online Affiliate Marketer

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: Mothers should help mothers.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer

lender.name: Tenisha
lender.loan_because: I hope that the little bit I can contribute will help make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people all over market themselves or their business. I also help just ordinary people print pictures for everyday use or for scrapbooking. I put together presentations and I also design just about any thing you could imagine! I love my job and the creativity that I get to express to so many different people.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: because we are adopting a child from Africa. We would like to help others make their lives a little easier.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government of Canada.

lender.name: TAMMY
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I give because I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: Love God. Love People.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: We've tried from the top down....let's try from the bottom up!
lender.occupational_info: Let's make a deal and move some product!

lender.name: Joshua Tobkin
lender.loan_because: it's time to redefine what it means to be a human.

lender.name: Matt Zylstra
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand at one point or another.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses market to their customers online.

lender.name: Kheri
lender.occupation: Employee of PT Ilthabi Bara Utama

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is giving a direct loan to person, not just to some faceless originization. It is more personal in this fast pace world that we live in today.
lender.occupational_info: I compound medications. Offer counseling on how to use the individuals medications. We help people get coverage for their drugs hat they need.

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich!!!, just want to do what is right.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a place that takes potatoes and slices them up REALY THIN, and then we fry them for about 3 minuets, and we call them POTATO CHIPS! In the USA it's a snack, something we eat when we don't haft to eat anything, probably because were board :-) , but it's a good place to work. God bless

lender.name: Amol Mittal
lender.loan_because: I rather use my money to help people than spend it on expensive brand name coffee drinks or $10 drinks at the bar.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Its understood that I can only be misunderstood.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: it helps empower others so that they can control their own lives!
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for the University of Colorado but am trying to get a job in microfinance.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending will change the world.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I believe that to whom much is given, much is expected. I try to live my life by that motto.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a high school in the United States.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: So many people need just a small chance to make their lives better. I have a lot to be grateful for and I hope to play a tiny role in giving them that chance!

lender.name: Jeff & Ness
lender.loan_because: Knowledge and resources are what I have to share until I have an opportunity to personally make a difference
lender.occupational_info: We treat the sick, care for those with disease

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: Independance is empowering.

lender.name: Forest
lender.loan_because: It's easy for me but makes a big difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal themselves.

lender.name: Chrissa
lender.loan_because: there is no better way to help someone help themselves. :)

lender.name: Emily Fong
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born into a life with advantages. Loaning is a way for me to do my small part to help those who did not have the same advantages at birth.
